institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 28 (Support for improving job skills of consortium business associates)
contents: Article 28 (Support for improving job skills of consortium business associates) ① The joint training center must allow consortium business associates to participate in the “Consortium business associate job education and training course” operated by the Hub Business Group, etc. to improve the job skills of consortium business associates. do. ② The Hub Business Group may operate education and training courses necessary to improve the job skills of consortium business associates, and may issue certificates, etc. to those who complete the education and training courses. ③ The hub business group must use profits generated from operating education and training courses for consortium business associates under paragraph 2 only for expenses related to consortium support projects, such as operating costs of the hub business group.
